00029 /*! A structure to hold a grid coordinate point. */
00030 typedef struct _CoordinatePoint
00031 { 
00032         /*! The X cooridnate */
00033         int32_t x;
00034 
00035         /*! The Y coordinate */
00036         int32_t y;
00037 
00038 } CoordinatePoint; 
00039 
00040 /*! A structure to hold the grid coordinates. */
00041 typedef struct _GridCoordinatesType
00042 {
00043         /*! The upper left corner. */
00044     CoordinatePoint upperleft;
00045 
00046         /*! The upper right corner. */
00047     CoordinatePoint upperright;
00048 
00049         /*! The lower right corner. */
00050     CoordinatePoint lowerright;
00051 
00052         /*! The lower left corner. */
00053     CoordinatePoint lowerleft;
00054 
00055 } GridCoordinatesType;
